EmailTemplate.description: Customer Maintenance: Add a Ship To
EmailTemplate.name: Add a Ship To
EmailTemplate.subject: Address Add - Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NEW PROCESS!!! All Contract Customer Maintenance, Pricing, SPC and ECommerce requests can now be submitted easily right from Salesforce.com! Beginning February 4, no further requests will be accepted via email. Please search "Account Maint" in the Answers tab to learn more information.
<Please send to contractmaint@officedepot.com (by Copy and pasting this email address into the Additional To line Above) and delete this section>
Team,
Please add the following address to Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c}- {!Account.Name}.
Addr Line 1: Addr Line 2: City: St: Zip:
